- select(.select2Basic) | 삭제: $(".select2Basic").select2('destroy') | Plugin API

- starpoint2 .5(.starpoint2-box)

스크롤바

- OverlayScrollbar 1.13.0 [스크롤 컨테이너에 (js-XXXXX ol_scroll-style [ol_scroll_light-style, ol_scroll_dark-style])클래스 추가 ] ol_scroll-style는 테마로 색변경가능 (link) Plugin API 

	
  var _overlayScrollbars = $(".js-XXXXX").overlayScrollbars({ })  // 스크롤 생성 
  _overlayScrollbars.destroy();                              // 스크롤 삭제

Gallery

- bxslider 4.12 (link) Plugin API 

	
  

    

      

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

      

      Prev
      Next
    

    

  


	
  // bxslider 세팅
  var _bxslider =  $('.bxslider-wrapper').bxSlider({            
    speed : 500,
    autoDelay : 3000, 
    controls:false,                    		 // 좌우버튼
    pagerSelector : $(".pagination"),      // 페이지 컨테이너
    onSlideAfter: function($slideElement, oldIndex, newIndex){		// 움직임이 끝나면 실행
      $(".pagination li").removeClass("current");
      $(".pagination li").eq(newIndex).addClass("current");
    }
  })

    // 좌우버튼
  $('.prev').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    _bxslider.goToPrevSlide();
  })
  $('.next').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    _bxslider.goToNextSlide();
  })

  // 컨텐츠에 마우스 올리면 일시정지
  $(".gallery_center").hover(function(){
    _bxslider.stopAuto();
  } ,
  function(){
    _bxslider.startAuto();
  })

	
  .gallery_view { width: 500px; margin: 0 auto;}
  .gallery_view .gallery_center {
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .gallery_view .pagination { text-align: center; }
  .gallery_view .pagination .bx-pager {  text-align: center; font-size: 0; line-height: 0; }
  .gallery_view .pagination .bx-pager .bx-pager-item { display: inline-block; 	font-size: 0; line-height: 0; }
  .gallery_view .pagination .bx-pager .bx-pager-item a { margin:5px 2px;  overflow: hidden;
    width: 8px;height: 8px;display: inline-block;border-radius: 100%;background: #000;opacity: .2;
    font-size: 0; line-height: 0; text-indent: 100px;
  }
  .gallery_view .pagination .bx-pager .bx-pager-item a.active {
    opacity: 1;
    background: #007aff;
  }

- swiper 4.5.0 (swiper4.5.0 link) API v4 

	
  

    

      

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

      

      Prev
      Next
      

    

  


	
 
  // Swiper 4.5.0세팅
    var mySwiper = new Swiper('.js-gallery_view .gallery_container',{
        slidesPerView: 1,	
        autoplay: {
            delay: 3000,
        },
        loop: true,		
        threshold : 20,         // 드래그 거리 이상일대 적용
        pagination: {
            el: '.js-gallery_view .pagination',
        },
        paginationClickable: true,
        navigation: {
            prevEl: '.js-gallery_view .prev',
            nextEl: '.js-gallery_view .next',
        },
        on: {
            init: function () { /* do something */ 
            },
            slideChange:function() { /* 슬라이드 바뀌면 실행 */ 
            },
            transitionEnd:function(){ 	// 움직임이 끝나면 실행
                console.log( "움직임 끝" );
            },
        }
    })

  mySwiper.slideTo(3);
  
  // 좌우버튼
  $('.gallery_center .prev').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    mySwiper.slidePrev();
  })
  $('.gallery_center .next').on('click', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    mySwiper.slideNext();
  })

  // 컨텐츠에 마우스 올리면 일시정지
  $(".gallery_center").hover(function(){
//		mySwiper.autoplay.stop();
  },
  function(){
//		mySwiper.autoplay.start();
  })


	
  .gallery_view { width: 500px; margin: 0 auto;}
  .gallery_view .gallery_center {
      width: 100%;
      position: relative;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-align: center;
  }
  .gallery_view .pagination { text-align: center; font-size: 0; line-height: 0;}
  .gallery_view .pagination .swiper-pagination-bullet { margin:5px 2px; overflow: hidden;
    width: 8px;height: 8px;display: inline-block;border-radius: 100%;background: #000;opacity: .2;
    font-size: 0; line-height: 0; text-indent: 100px;
  }
  .gallery_view .pagination .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    opacity: 1;
    background: #007aff;
  }
